actions.name: Frozen Armor

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack from a non Ice-Type creature.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a [Contact] attack from a non Ice-Type creature.

Effect: The triggering creature takes a Tick of HP damage. The user is immune to the @Affliction[burn] Affliction.
